sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Here begynneth a merry ieste of a shrewde and curste wyfe, lapped in morrelles skin, for her good behauyour Merry jeste of a shrewde and curste wyfe, lapped in morrelles skin, for her good behavyour. Bramis, Joannes.
[48] p. : ill. (woodcuts)
In Fleetestrete, beneath the Conduite, at the signe of Saint Iohn Euaungelist, by H. Jackson, Imprinted at London : [1580?]
By Joannes Bramis. Probably a translation, but original title not traced. In verse. Publication date conjectured by STC. Signatures: A-F⁴. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======

In Fleetestrete, beneath the Conduite, at the signe of Saint Iohn Euaungelist, by H. Jackson, Imprinted at London : [1580?]
